message: Let's start with a reasonable offer, Bob. I take 60% and you get a solid 40%.
Let's be fair, Alice. A 55/45 split seems more reasonable considering the time pressure.
While I appreciate the offer, Bob, I believe my initial proposal was fairer. Let's not be hasty.
Okay, Bob, let's meet in the middle. I'll take 55% and you get 45% before inflation eats away at it further.
